statements: SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, age FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT customer_id, name, location FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE interests LIKE '%sports%';
SELECT customer_id, name, age, gender FROM customers WHERE location = 'New York' AND age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, location FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age BETWEEN 25 AND 35;
SELECT customer_id, gender, interests FROM customers WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE interests LIKE '%sports%' OR interests LIKE '%music%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_customers FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM customer_segments;
SELECT customer_id, segment_name FROM customer_segments WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM ad_campaigns WHERE target_segment_id = 3 ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT segment_name, count(*) as total_customers FROM customer_segments GROUP BY segment_name;
SELECT * FROM customer_segments ORDER BY segment_name DESC, customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, segment_name FROM customer_segments WHERE segment_name = 'VIP';
SELECT segment_name, segment_description FROM customer_segments WHERE segment_description LIKE '%important%';
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY campaign_name ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM ad_campaigns JOIN customer_segments ON ad_campaigns.target_segment_id = customer_segments.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers
SELECT purchase_date, amount FROM purchases
SELECT segment_name, audience_size FROM ad_segments
SELECT customer_name, age, gender FROM customers
SELECT amount, product_id FROM purchases
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY customer_name DESC
SELECT segment_name, audience_size FROM ad_segments WHERE audience_size > 10000
SELECT purchase_date, amount FROM purchases WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 50
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT customer_name, email, age FROM customers
SELECT * FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC
SELECT category, total_amount FROM purchases WHERE total_amount > 100
SELECT customer_id, city, country FROM customers WHERE age < 30
SELECT customer_name, email, city FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, city, country FROM customers WHERE age >= 30 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT segment_name, audience_size FROM ad_segments WHERE created_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY audience_size DESC;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date, total_amount, category FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE c.age < 40 AND p.total_amount < 500 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 'a1b2c3';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_spent FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id HAVING SUM(purchase_amount) > 1000;
SELECT segment_name, criteria FROM segments WHERE last_updated > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE first_name = 'John' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, product_name, purchase_amount FROM purchases JOIN customers ON purchases.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE customers.first_name = 'Alice';
SELECT segment_name, created_date FROM segments WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY created_date ASC;
